definition: A tool commonly employed for performing various tasks involving the creation of holes or drilling into different materials. It is frequently utilized in construction, woodworking, and metalworking projects.

examples.german: Ich brauche eine Bohrmaschine, um das Loch zu bohren.
examples.english: I need a drill to drill the hole.

examples.german: Die Bohrmaschine hat eine hohe Leistung.
examples.english: The drill has a high power.

examples.german: Mein Vater hat mir seine Bohrmaschine geliehen.
examples.english: My father lent me his drill.
